timeline.message: Add DocumentOperationParameters to document session API
Use trace level from parameters, and pass on to Response
Use NOT_FOUND in DocumentResponse as well — as success

timeline.author: bratseth

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/documentapi/src/main/java/com/yahoo/documentapi/AsyncSession.java b/documentapi/src/main/java/com/yahoo/documentapi/AsyncSession.java index 721faf281f..60f70a9133 100644 --- a/documentapi/src/main/java/com/yahoo/documentapi/AsyncSession.java +++ b/documentapi/src/main/java/com/yahoo/documentapi/AsyncSession.java @@ -201,7 +201,7 @@ public interface AsyncSession extends Session { *

Removes a document if it is present. This method returns immediately.

* *

If this result is a success, this - * call will cause one or more {@link DocumentIdResponse} objects to apprear within the timeout time of this session. + * call will cause one or more {@link DocumentIdResponse} objects to appear within the timeout time of this session. * The response returned later will either be a success, or contain the document id submitted here. * If it was not a success, this method has no further effects.

*
